Key Match Events: Abdoulaye Seck headed home a Krepin Diatta free-kick to give the Lions of Teranga a deserved lead
Iliman Ndiaye wrapped up the victory on the cusp of stoppage time with an excellent finish from Mane's tidy assist
Pre-Game Insights: Senegal confirmed their spot as Group C winners on Tuesday night and maintained their 100 per cent record in defence of their first title from 2021
Post-Match Reflections: Guinea pipped to second spot in Group C courtesy of Cameroon's dramatic late win over The Gambia
Kaba Diawara's side will still advance with four points as one of the four best third-place group finishers at the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: Senegal easily through as Group C winners as the holders maintain their 100 per cent start to their first AFCON title defence
Cameroon will now face Group A runners-up Nigeria at the Felix Houphouet Boigny Stadium in Abidjan on Saturday night for a place in the quarter-finals
